description: Conservation Area Consent to relocate main access door to building and to excavate a limited area to the internal courtyard garden to facilitate new external escape staircase.  Demolition to external north facing wall to internal courtyard garden to facilitate ground floor windows and basement high level windows.  Amendments to existing west facing elevation - removing door
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved is comprised of the following drawings and documents:

01.2119;   02;2119;  03.2119;  04.2119;  05.2119 & 06.2119.   101.2119 - 105.2119.   201.2119 - 209.2119.   301.2119 - 311.2119 [LBI REG: 06731]  2119 A Ele 110 - 2119 A Ele 115 (LBI REG: 06732)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended, the Reason to Grant and to ensure that the development is built in accordance with the drawing and documents so approved.
